structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.text: On completion of collection of assessments, distribution of funds and retirement of all bonds, a sewer construction district may be dissolved by order of the county judge/executive.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 208, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 17, effective June 19, 1952.
